articles.description: Four most common symptoms of Omicron variant are cough, fatigue, congestion and runny nose, according to US CDC analysis. UK-based Zoe Covid app study added new symptoms of nausea and loss of appetite
articles.content: Omicron is a variant of global concern due to its high transmissibility. Emerging research has revealed that the Omicron variant causes less damage to the lungs and less severe disease when compared … [+1118 chars]

articles.title: COVID 19: New nasal spray effective against all variants - National Herald
articles.description: The nasal spray consists of a molecule, developed by researchers at the University of Helsinki, Finland, that can inactivate the coronavirus spike protein
articles.content:
In contrast to vaccine protection, the effect of TriSb92 begins immediately after its administration.
